attributes.action: THAT ALL PLASTIC PRODUCTS MUST CONTAIN 10%  RECYCLED PLASTIC.
attributes.additional_details: To give a monetary value to recycled plastic which would  then  refuse companies and councils to filter out plastic to sell on the open encouragers refuse companies I spoke to someone in a refuge company who said they have no incentive to separate plastics as there is no material gain for them they would separated if there was
attributes.background: To bring forward legislation that makes it illegal to produce Products that do not contain recycled plastic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553651

Your petition title is about using recycled plastics in production, but the bulk of your petition text appears to be about how plastics are recycled, which is already covered by the above petition.
